code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Notification=()=>{const[notifications,setNotifications]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{const fetchNotifications=async()=>{const response=await axios.get('/api/notifications',{headers:{'x-auth-token':localStorage.getItem('token')}});setNotifications(response.data);};fetchNotifications();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Your Notifications"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:notifications.map(notification=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:[notification.message," - ",notification.read?'Read':'Unread']},notification._id))})]});};export default Notification;
